meanings.sent1: The plastic bottle is made of nonorganic materials.
meanings.sent2: The factory emits nonorganic pollutants into the air.
meanings.sent3: The nonorganic apple costume at the party was a hit!
meanings.sent4: Her nonorganic smile didn't reach her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The nonorganic sound of the machine echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: Not involving or produced by organic matter.
meanings.sent1: The nonorganic fertilizer helped the plants grow.
meanings.sent2: The synthetic fabric is nonorganic and doesn't breathe well.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his nonorganic dance moves were robotic.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a mix of organic and nonorganic structures.
meanings.sent5: The nonorganic taste of the canned soup was disappointing.

meanings.definition: Not of, relating to, or derived from living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The nonorganic chemistry experiment yielded interesting results.
meanings.sent2: The nonorganic rock formations were created by geological processes.
meanings.sent3: The nonorganic theme of the party was futuristic.
meanings.sent4: Her nonorganic approach to problem-solving was methodical.
meanings.sent5: The nonorganic smell of the cleaning solution filled the room.
